divs: Sighting DetailsI was at work just at sundown sitting in my Jeep. I looked out over the near by Mountain, Mt. Solo, Because I could see a storm system moving in from the west. I was on my Cell Phone talking to my Fiancee at the time. Hovering over the mountain was a bright orange fireball. It did not move for three to four minutes. I had to look away for a second to check something, I work in Security and have certin Responsibilities, and when I turned back it was gone. A few days later I was looking at a Photo posted to Coast to Coast AM's website of the same type of object over Mt. Adams on the same night. When I first saw the object I passed it off as a play of the setting sun on the incoming storm, but, after seeing the Photo, and that the photo was taken on the same night, I knew that it was not something Normal.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Longview
There were no other sightings in Longview on or around June 21st 2008
